description.brief: ROS Packages from the UT AustinVilla Robot Soccer Team

stack.description: This stack keeps all the packages from UT AustinVilla in the efforts towards the RoboCup Competition. Currently it contains a color table generation tool, along with a ground truth detection system using the Kinect that can be used for Nao robot.
stack.author: Maintained by Piyush Khandelwal
